sn56.3:4.3: or present—rightly go forth from the lay life to homelessness, all of them do so in order to truly comprehend the four noble truths.
sn56.3:5.2: The noble truths of suffering, the origin of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering.
sn56.3:5.5: or present— rightly go forth from the lay life to homelessness, all of them do so in order to truly comprehend the four noble truths.
sn56.3:6.1: That’s why you should practice meditation to understand: ‘This is suffering’ … ‘This is the origin of suffering’ … ‘This is the cessation of suffering’ … ‘This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering’.”
